tooltip.text_display.nbt.text: The Text of the Display Entity.

tooltip.text_display.nbt.see_through: Whether the Text Display should be see through.
tooltip.entity.nbt.invulnerable: Whether the Entity should take any damage.
tooltip.entity.nbt.no_gravity: Whether the Entity is affected by Gravity.
tooltip.entity.nbt.silent: Whether the Entity should make sounds.

tooltip.entity.nbt.custom_name: Gives the Entity a Custom Name.
tooltip.living_entity.nbt.health: The Health Points of the Entity (2 times as its hearts).
tooltip.mob_entity.nbt.can_pickup_loot: Whether the Entity should be able to pickup loot.
tooltip.mob_entity.nbt.persistence_requi: Whether the Entity should not despawn.
tooltip.mob_entity.nbt.left_handed: Whether the Entity is left handed (not sure what this is used for).
tooltip.mob_entity.nbt.no_ai: Whether the Entity should Move, Attack, Pickup. Generally just stops everything AI related.
tooltip.passive.nbt.forced_age: The Forced Age of the Entity.
tooltip.animal.nbt.in_love: Whether the Entity is in Love.
tooltip.animal.nbt.love_cause: The Love Cause of the Entity.
tooltip.armor_stand.nbt.invisible: Whether the Armor Stand should be Invisible.

tooltip.armor_stand.nbt.hide_baseplate: Whether to hide the Armor Stands baseplate.
tooltip.armor_stand.nbt.marker: Whether the Armor Stand should be a Marker (Useful for Map-making).
tooltip.area_effect_cloud.nbt.age: The Age of the Area Effect Cloud.
tooltip.area_effect_cloud.nbt.duration: How long the Area Effect Cloud should last.
tooltip.area_effect_cloud.nbt.wait_time: How long the Area Effect cloud should wait before starting the effect.
tooltip.area_effect_cloud.nbt.reapplicat: How often to Re-Apply the Effects of the Area Effect Cloud.
tooltip.area_effect_cloud.nbt.duration_o: How long to set the duration of the Area Effect Cloud when an Entity enters it.
tooltip.area_effect_cloud.nbt.radius_on_: How much to increase or decrease the Radius of the Area Effect Cloud when an entity enters it.
tooltip.area_effect_cloud.nbt.radius_per: How much to increase or decrease the Radius of the Area Effect Cloud every tick.
tooltip.area_effect_cloud.nbt.radius: The Radius of the Area Effect Cloud.
tooltip.area_effect_cloud.nbt.particle: The Particle of the Area Effect Cloud.
tooltip.area_effect_cloud.nbt.potion: The Potion of the Area Effect Cloud.
tooltip.area_effect_cloud.nbt.effects: The Effects of the Area Effect Cloud.
